definition: foreign minister/secretary of state/minister of foreign affairs

sentences.english: A document from their meeting said the situation in Afghanistan is deteriorating.
sentences.chinese: 外長會議的一份文件說阿富汗的局勢正在惡化。

sentences.english: According to reports, Cambodian foreign ministers will attend the 14th meeting of the Council.
sentences.chinese: 據報道，泰柬兩國外長將出席14日的安理會會議。

sentences.english: But Khalid Kaim, the deputy foreign minister, said emphatically, “We have no intention of entering the city of Benghazi.”
sentences.chinese: 但副外長強調說“我們沒有進入班加西的意圖”。

sentences.english: But the Chinese authorities, including Foreign Minister Yang, are dealing with this matter as an individual case.
sentences.chinese: 但是中國當局，包括楊外長，都把這事當作個案。

sentences.english: On the same day, Yang held talks with his Gabonese counterpart Paul Toungui.
sentences.chinese: 同日，楊潔篪與加蓬外長通吉舉行會談。

sentences.english: First, some opening remarks from Minister Yang.
sentences.chinese: 現在先請楊外長講幾句話。

sentences.english: The minister of foreign affairs mediated between two warring countries.
sentences.chinese: 外長在兩個交戰國之間進行積極的斡旋。

sentences.english: Prior to this meeting, Li also held talks with Somsavat, Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister of the Laos.
sentences.chinese: 此前，李肇星與老撾副總理兼外長宋薩瓦舉行了會談。

sentences.english: Thirdly, can you bring us up to date on Foreign Minster Li Zhaoxing's visit to Europe?
sentences.chinese: 第三，請介紹李肇星外長訪歐的情況。

sentences.english: Tang expressed satisfaction over the recent steady development of Sino-Mexican relations.
sentences.chinese: 唐外長對近年來中墨雙邊關係持續發展表示滿意。

sentences.english: Foreign Minister Li Zhaoxing will meet with him on the sideline of the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 會議期間，李肇星外長將與他會面。

sentences.english: In addition, two people in addition to hair color and style outside the spirit is quite long.
sentences.chinese: 此外，兩人除了膚色和髮式之外長的頗爲神似。

sentences.english: Vice Foreign Minister He Yafei will head the Chinese delegation at the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 何亞非副外長將率團出席會議。

sentences.english: Arab League foreign ministers met in Cairo to discuss the crisis.
sentences.chinese: 阿拉伯聯盟成員國外長在開羅開會討論目前的危機。

sentences.english: Mr. A an is meeting Friday in Bru els with European Union foreign ministers.
sentences.chinese: 安南星期五在布魯塞爾與歐盟外長舉行會談。

sentences.english: On the same day, Li also held talks with Lithuanian Foreign Minister Antanas Valionis.
sentences.chinese: 同日，李肇星還與立陶宛外長瓦廖尼斯舉行了會談。

definition: Angela Merkel (1954-), German CDU politician, chancellor from 2005
NATO/abbr. for 北大西洋公約組織|北大西洋公约组织[Bei3 Da4 xi1 Yang2 Gong1 yue1 Zu3 zhi1], North Atlantic Treaty Organization
